Bah... Whatever, this better be worth my fucking time.

Fuck yeah!

Hey Robo-Dick, where the hell are your eyes?
Are you fucking serious... I'm playing strip poker with a fucking car!?
Holy Jesus, that axe is bigger than your tits!
The fuck is wrong with you, bringing your guns in here? Are you trying to kill all of us, you bitch!
Hey redneck, how's Alabama been treatin' ya?
Wait, is that cosplay, or are you a real wizard? Don't answer that, I don't care.

Heh... Hey Tinky Winky, how's it feel to be rejected?

Well damn, if I stare at you for too long, I'm probably gonna feel the vapors.

How's it feel being the odd one out, Amy?
Hey Angie! How's it feel being overshadowed by a pink-haired cupcake?
How's Danganaronpa working out for you, Junko?
Holy fuck, you're short. How's the weather down there?
Damn, this is taking Princess and the Pauper to a whole 'nother level...
I always thought the sexy librarian trope was a myth. Guess you proved me right!
Oh come on, why the hell do they even name people after months... What's next, people named Friday!?
Quite the upgrade you got there... Suction Cup Man is impressed.
Sorry Princess, the beauty pageant is in the other room.
Hey Asuna... Your name sounds like the result of a very horrible pun.
A goddess? Well then, how'd you enjoy the show down in Hell when I made Satan eat a dick?
I better not cut myself with the edginess you're giving out.
Damn, that's a big-ass syringe. You like stabbing people with that shit?

Hey chef! You missed a spot... On top of her head!

I surely hope you aren't as thick in the IQ department as you are with your body!

...Man, and I thought I was harsh.

...Well, aren't you all high and mighty? You're not special just because you know a little magic. Big fucking deal.

How's that little shit of a penguin been treating ya?
